arts.ttl: Magic Sam Dalby leaves Jim Goodwin in Dundee Utd disbelief as hitman backed to hilt to gun down Maeda and Murray
arts.sum: Dalby is in a three-way battle with Daizen Maeda and Simon Murray for the top scorer gong

arts.ttl: James Wilson will learn from mad Hearts moment as Neil Critchley speaks out on Dundee United dismissal
arts.sum: The teenage star saw red as the Jambos were beaten 1-0 by Dundee United at Tynecastle on Sunday

arts.ttl: Top-six race goes down to final game after Hearts defeat
arts.sum: Hearts, St Mirren and Motherwell are all battling for the one remaining top-six spot in the Scottish Premiership. Who will prevail next weekend?

arts.ttl: James Wilson red card decision slated as pundit fumes at call to send off youngest ever Scotland cap
arts.sum: The teenage striker, who made his Scotland debut in the Nations League defeat to Greece last month, was shown a straight red card by referee Walsh just 38 minutes into Hearts ' crucial Premiership meeting with Dundee United. Former Hearts midfielder Michael Stewart ripped into referee Nick Walsh over his decision to send off wonderkid James Wilson .

arts.ttl: Sam Dalbyâ€™s header earns Dundee United victory at 10-man Hearts
arts.sum: Hearts forward James Wilson was sent off in the 38th minute.

arts.ttl: Michael Stewart explodes with Hearts red card rage as Nick Walsh told 'get a grip' in live TV rant
arts.sum: Safe to say Stewart didn't think James Wilson's red card was a sending off offence
